entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
